description:
A Windows installer for the Hack typeface.

A Windows installer for the Hack typeface.
While it might seem like overkill to use a Windows installer for fonts, there is good reason for this on the Windows platform.
- Updated to Hack v3.003
- Setup renamed to HackFontsWindowsInstaller
- New icon for installer
- The destination folder for new installs is now C:\Program Files\Hack Fonts
